name: Mantra
details:
Distortion TECHNICAL SPECS |
9V – 18V!!! Negative center supply with 2.1mm plug required; top mounted.
Mono input/output jacks; side mounted.
10-15mA current draw
4.75″ tall x 2.75″ wide; 2.5″ height
Treble, Bass, Gain, Volume controls
Extremely touch sensitive cleanup, guitar volume knob clean up
Made by hand in Asheville, NC USA
True bypass switching
